sections.title: Steve DeAnda
sections.summary: As an analytical and highly motivated professional with 8+ years of leadership development, customer service, quality assurance, and operational training, I am well positioned to align my skill set to meet the demands needed to exceed this role. With the ability to quickly grasp new information and my drive to achieve, I enjoy taking ownership of new challenges to constantly pursue personal growth while cultivating a motivating environment. As a loyal and engaged team player, I value partnership and support structure to provide consistency throughout the company so we can provide optimal success. For these reasons, I will add incredible value to your company.

tasks: Managed site intallations, repair, maintenance and test equipment for over 150 clients.
Discussed and recommended service options with clients.
Installed new equipment and explained operation and routine maintenance protocols to clients.
Tested systems, noting issues and completing preventative maintenance.
Programmed and installed new systems to meet demands of consumer needs.
Itemized documentation and necessary functions to compile records of custumer accounts.
Discussed and recommended service options with customers and explained costs involved.
